text:
@realDonaldTrump HOW DARE YOU?!? 
Innocent people are dying. 
Poloce forces are abusing peaceful protesters.
Black Americans are being prosecuted for the color of their skin.
And over 100,000 Americans have died of coronavirus.
WTF IS WRONG WITH YOU?!?
#blacklivesmatter
